[ T always passive ] If a dead person or animal is reincarnated as someone or something else, their spirit returns to life in that person or animal.
[ T ] If something is reincarnated, it appears in a different form, especially after it has disappeared for a period of time: Compared to the old model, the reincarnated Mini Cooper has a more powerful engine and looks more streamlined.
